name: Knight's Never ending dungeon
description:
Hi everyone,

I'm sharing my project with you. As a big fan of roguelike games I am building one.

The game doesn't yet have a story. But you'll find :

-A new dungeon each time you die or press"r"

-Randomly generated ennemies on each map

-Upgrades that you can buy or loot

-Store and loot rooms

-Each room have a different fight to take, kill all ennemies.

-Get coins to buy lifes or adding damage

-1 Boss

Q to fire and space to jump. Take care of golbins.

Updates for graphics ands adding more ennemies and cumulative effects will come soon.

Tell me what you think !

New Update 1: 

Adding Doors, Camera lock, Dezoom to better suits the need, graphics.

A lot of new loot and rooms in next update

New Update 2:

More loots, fixing some graphic bugs
